All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ayaka
Ayaka is a custom logger designed to handle logging independently of the standard logging frameworks like Logback or Log4j, especially in cases where Spring framework configurations override application-level logging settings.
Ayaka.LogLevel
Enum representing the various log levels supported by Ayaka.
BatchJobConfig
BatchJobConfig is a configuration class that sets up the Spring Batch job, steps, readers, processors, and writers for processing future movements.
BatchJobConfigTest
 
InputRecord
Represents an input record for processing future movements.
JobStatusListener
JobStatusListener is a Spring component that listens for the lifecycle events of a batch job.
OutputRecord
Represents an output record for the daily summary report in the process future movement system.
ProcessFutureMovementApplication
The entry point of the ProcessFutureMovement Spring Boot application.
ProcessFutureMovementApplicationTests
 
ProcessFutureMovementController
REST controller for handling requests related to processing future movements.
ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessor
ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessor uses the Fork/Join framework to parallelize the processing of InputRecord objects into OutputRecord objects.
ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest
This class contains performance tests for the ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessorTest
Unit tests for ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessor
ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessor uses a MapReduce-like approach to parallelize the processing of InputRecord objects into OutputRecord objects.
ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest
This class contains performance tests for the ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessorTest
Unit tests for ProcessFutureMovementMapReduceTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamsTaskletProcessor
ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamsTaskletProcessor uses Java Parallel Streams to process the input records and generate an aggregated result for the output.
ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest
This class contains performance tests for the ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamTaskletProcessorTest
Unit tests for ProcessFutureMovementParallelStreamsTaskletProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementProcessor
ProcessFutureMovementProcessor processes input records to produce output records.
ProcessFutureMovementProcessorPerformanceTest
This class contains performance tests for the ProcessFutureMovementProcessor.
ProcessFutureMovementProcessorTest
 
ProcessFutureMovementReader
ProcessFutureMovementReader is a custom implementation of FlatFileItemReader for reading fixed-width input records from a file and mapping them to InputRecord objects.
ProcessFutureMovementReaderTest
 
ProcessFutureMovementRecord
ProcessFutureMovementRecord is an empty marker interface used to abstract testing between input and output records in the process future movement system.
ProcessFutureMovementService
The ProcessFutureMovementService interface defines a contract for processing future movement transactions.
ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor
ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor is a service class responsible for processing the input data and generating a daily summary report.
ProcessFutureMovementWriter
 
WebConfig
WebConfig is a configuration class that handles Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for the application, allowing specific origins to access the API.
